sentences.en: And if you doubt that, then go look at the aurora borealis.

sentences.en: The spinning aurora shall cause an increase pace of global warming.

words.tran_cn: 极光的；曙光的；玫瑰红的

trans.tran_en: an atmospheric phenomenon consisting of bands, curtains, or streamers of light, usually green, red, or yellow, that move across the sky in polar regions
